ai-tha-ap319:1.3_0: like one who is surrounded by darkness.
ai-tha-ap319:1.4_0: you stay in the delightful house.
ai-tha-ap319:2.2_0: he proceeds like a large crowd,
ai-tha-ap319:2.4_0: they’re bound to gods of the lion,
ai-tha-ap319:3.1_0: Having heard the sound of drums,
ai-tha-ap319:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap319:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap319:4.4_0: this fruit is the perception of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap319:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mahā Moggallāna.
ai-tha-ap319:7.1_0: Seeing the seventh Elder Nun Uttarakuru
